openpibo.modules.speech.google_trans_new module¶

exception openpibo.modules.speech.google_trans_new.google_new_transError(msg=None, **kwargs)¶

기반 클래스: Exception

Exception that uses context to present a meaningful error message

infer_msg(tts, rsp=None)¶
class openpibo.modules.speech.google_trans_new.google_translator(url_suffix='cn', timeout=5, proxies=None)¶

기반 클래스: object

You can use 108 language in target and source,details view LANGUAGES. Target language: like 〈en〉、〉zh〉、〉th〉…

매개변수

  • url_suffix (UTF-8 str; unicode; string sequence (list, tuple, iterator, generator)) – The source text(s) to be translated. Batch translation is supported via sequence input. The value should be one of the url_suffix listed in : DEFAULT_SERVICE_URLS

  • text (UTF-8 str; unicode;) – The source text(s) to be translated.

  • lang_tgt (str; unicode) – The language to translate the source text into. The value should be one of the language codes listed in : LANGUAGES

  • lang_src (str; unicode) – The language of the source text. The value should be one of the language codes listed in googletrans.LANGUAGES If a language is not specified, the system will attempt to identify the source language automatically.

  • timeout (number or a double of numbers) – Timeout Will be used for every request.

  • proxies (class : dict; like: {〈http〉: 〈http:171.112.169.47:19934/〉, 〈https〉: 〈https:171.112.169.47:19934/〉}) – proxies Will be used for every request.

detect(text)¶
translate(text, lang_tgt='auto', lang_src='auto', pronounce=False)¶
